title: Ticket #6261: Implement SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_REASON
description: HTCondor-CE makes use of SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE for jobs held longer than 24 hours (https://github.com/opensciencegrid/htcondor-ce/blob/master/config/01-ce-router.conf.in#L53-L63). We've also configured SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE_REASON, presuming it would act similarly to SYSTEM_PERIODIC_HOLD_REASON, but it looks like it isn't actually a configuration knob. Could this be implemented so that RemoveReason gets added to the job log after SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE gets triggered?
